column2: Saddle my horse! Oh we don't have horses...
I should look for her myself.
What a nice place. Maybe I could relax a bit.
Commoner knows where to find a witch
I should go see this witch myself
I am [Root.GetTitledName] and you I came for you witch.
This is granny Charlize, not a witch.
I don't think so... It's time for a witch soup.
I look forward for my own bed.
Have you ever seen your nose?
You haven't found anything suspicious during your visit.
Burn the village down, it's better for them to die.
